description.value: This suite offers a single room, or series of rooms, typically located near the cockpit, featuring a number of seats and individual storage, as well as communal refresher stations (one for every 16 seats), to transport a number of civilians, crew members, or troopers equal to four times the ship's suite capacity by size, as shown in the @JournalEntry[Mnvw9iBw8gxgfCXw]{Starship Size Suite Capacity} table.
